original_text: By the way that he came, by the same shall he return, and shall not come into this city, saith the Lord.
korean_text: 그가 오던 길 곧 그 길로 돌아가고 이 성에 이르지 못하리라 나 여호와의 말이니라

sentences.original_text: By the way that he came
by the same shall he return
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 왔던 것과 같은 길로 돌아오리라

sentences.original_text: and shall not come into this city
